00017 #ifndef _VIENNACL_PROGRAM_HPP_
00018 #define _VIENNACL_PROGRAM_HPP_
00019 
00020 
00021 #include "viennacl/ocl/handle.hpp"
00022 #include "viennacl/ocl/device.hpp"
00023 
00024 namespace viennacl
00025 {
00026   namespace ocl
00027   {
00028     class program
00029     {
00030     public:
00031       program() {}
00032       program(const handle<cl_program> & _prog) : h(_prog) {}
00033       
00034       program & operator=(const handle<cl_program> & _prog) { h = _prog; return *this; }
00035 
00036       const handle<cl_program> & get() const { return h; }
00037 
00038       void create(const char * source)
00039       {
00040         std::string source2(source);
00041         create(source2);
00042       }
00043       
00044       void create(std::string & source)
00045       {
00046         const char * source_text = source.c_str();
00047         size_t source_size = source.size();
00048         
00049         //std::cout << "Building source: " << std::endl;
00050         //std::cout << _source << std::endl;
00051 
00052         cl_int err;
00053         h = clCreateProgramWithSource(device().context(), 1, (const char **)&source_text, &source_size, &err);
00054         //if (err != CL_SUCCESS)
00055           //std::cerr << _source << std::endl;
00056         //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00057         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00058         //Timer watch;
00059         //double cpu_time = watch.get();
00060         //err = clBuildProgram(prog, 0, NULL, "-cl-mad-enable", NULL, NULL);
00061         err = clBuildProgram(h, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00062         //std::cout << "Build time: " << watch.get() - cpu_time << std::endl;
00063         //assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00064         //if (err != CL_SUCCESS)
00065         //  std::cerr << _source << std::endl;
00066         
00067         //additional debug info
00068         #ifdef VCL_BUILD_INFO
00069         char buffer[1024];
00070         cl_build_status status;
00071         clGetProgramBuildInfo(h, device().id(), CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_STATUS, sizeof(cl_build_status), &status, NULL);
00072         clGetProgramBuildInfo(h, device().id(), CL_PROGRAM_BUILD_LOG, sizeof(char)*1024, &buffer, NULL);
00073         std::cout << "Build Scalar: Err = " << err << " Status = " << status << std::endl;
00074         std::cout << "Log: " << buffer << std::endl;
00075         #endif
00076 
00077         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00078       }
00079 
00080     private:
00081       handle<cl_program> h;
00082     };
00083   } //namespace ocl
00084 } //namespace viennacl
00085 
00086 
00087 #endif
